segments.text: Would you please show me the necklace in the window ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is this the one you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , the one next to it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . What kind of stone is this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a ruby . It is from South Africa . Would you like to try it on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , please . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks good . OK . I'll take it .
segments.speaker: S1
